about.title: FronTech (FrauEn Technology)
about.desc1: Our core team dates back to 1995â€“2005, originally providing public procurement outsourcing across multiple government-invested sectors (municipal engineering, broadcasting, public safety/fire, hydropower stations, roads and pipelines, hotels, networks, industrial goods). Since 2005 we have focused on introducing products and technologies for the research sector, serving institutes, universities, hospitals and enterprise R&D centers with one-stop services: advanced lab equipment & consumables import, technical and bidding consulting, lab design & build, international contract execution, duty reduction, compliance evaluation, and incubation & follow-along investments. We are now a benchmark supply-chain platform for the GBA research ecosystem.
about.desc2: By 2019 we had served 100+ universities, hospitals and research institutes. By end of 2024, our coverage among Shenzhen universities exceeded 95%.

items.text: Public procurement outsourcing for foreign trade
Initial build-out of a new public procurement supply-chain platform
R&D-focused government supply-chain platform; focusing on universities, institutes, and hospitals
Platform maturity in the research sector
Developed a full-process e-procurement solution; incubated multiple SMB bidding agencies
First approved FBS importer under Shenzhen Customs; by 2025 served 200+ labs, becoming the largest serum importer in the GBA
Consulting business launched; 3-in-1 service model (policy research, industrial planning, tailored programs); involved in 20+ key GBA projects
Scanco MicroCT Shenzhen Scanning Service Center established
Worked with 100+ universities, hospitals, and institutes; recognized benchmark in R&D supply chains
Growth stage as a Tech Services & Investment platform covering scanning, consumables, new-drug tech introduction, and stem-cell translation
Shenzhen university coverage exceeded 95%; expanded across core GBA cities (Guangzhou, Foshan, Jiangmen)
